Experience

    • Getting very good exposure to the latest trends in FinTech and Cyber-security.

  • Student Ambassador June, 2016 - pres
    University of Southampton

    • Offering mentoring and e-mentoring activities to our prospective students
    • Delivering campus tours and activities to pupils interested in higher education
    • Representing the University of Southampton in different events and settlements.

  • Java and Web Developer Intern June – Sept 2016
    Akixi Ltd.

    • Developed a new utility to provide compilation of JSP files on the go
    • Manipulated Apache Tomcat to capture the static HTML output from JSP files
    • Created a new Java Servlet web application to be used for testing purposes.
